Name: King Reggie
Description: King Reggie though he had a wonderful land and had a beautiful kingdom planned, he wanted to grow it larger than what it was. He had lofty dreams! He was able to borrow much magical beans from other kingdoms, his serfs, and even from other nobles. However, unbeknownst to many poor King Reggie had quite a drinking problem and squandered much of the gold into his vast wine collection and soon when the debtors came he had nowhere else to run! The founder took pity on this King and gave him a chance to compete in his game show for a chance to payoff those enormous debts!
